title: Baker Gurvitz Army (Studio Discography) [FLAC]
description:
great hard progressive blues-rock from UK with outstanding drumming of Ginger Baker (Cream, Blind Faith) joined by Paul and Adrian Gurvitz (The Gun, Three Man Army)


albums:

    Baker Gurvitz Army (1974)
    Elysian Encounter (1975)
    Hearts On Fire (1976)
 
logfiles & cover art included


lineup:


    Ginger Baker: Drums
    Adrian Gurvitz: Guitar, vocals
    Paul Gurvitz: Bass guitar, backing vocals
    Mr Snips a.k.a. Steve Parsons: Lead Vocals
    Peter Lemer: Keyboards
